sub_title: I'm helping companies to gain a real technology competitive advantage.
summary:
Competitive advantage is indeed at the heart of a firm's performance in competitive markets.

I'm enabling companies to gain a competitive advantage by applying the right technologies, building state-of-the-art architectures, using a product development mindset, and doing business analysis.

I believe in the principles of passion, focus, and taking charge: 
• Be passionate about the things you do – or stop doing them. 
• Focus on a few things and finish them before you move on. 
• Take charge and potentially deliver slightly more than expected.

I am Oleksandr, a passionate, hands-on, highly motivated CTO, Sr. Solution Architect, and Technical Strategy Advisor with over one and half decades of considerable engineering, product, Digital Transformation, and Managerial experience.

Past 15+ years, I have served in SaaS, B2B scaleup companies, and Fortune 500 companies as:
• Interim VP of Engineering | CTO
• Sr. Engineering Manager
• Lead Solution Architect
• Cloud Architect
• Enterprise Architect
• Enterprise Strategist
• Technical Strategy Advisor

I have broad and deep technology knowledge and the ability to architect solutions by mapping common customer business problems to end-to-end technology solutions.

I architect systems to enable businesses to add value to their products and satisfy their customers by increasing the speed of delivery with a good enough product at first, then gradually making it better.

To succeed, I believe in choosing the best technology or approach and choosing because it fits for purpose. Besides, whatever we choose must be flexible enough to evolve so our technology portfolio can adapt to business goals and technology changes.

How do we know if we have selected the right technology and approaches? The critical point is to be able to measure all decisions, implementations, and processes.

I take pride in increasing employee engagement and scaling high-performance teams that align on vision, execute across targets, and improve the value chain.

So far, I'm involved in designing and building various applications such as web, mobile, desktop, distributed systems, microservices, IoT, client-side, and back-end solutions running on AWS, GCP, and Azure cloud providers. I enable customer success and digital transformation by leveraging the power of AI, public clouds, and data science.

In short: Strategy, Innovation, Teamwork, Results, Commitment, Quality, and Wins are vital things that drive me in my work.

Want to support me? Please help Come Back Alive: https://savelife.in.ua/en/

awards.title: Winner Global AI Hackathon (challenge "Emotional Artificial Intelligence)
awards.description:
Worked on the challenge "Emotional AI".

Worked on 'Smart Diary' solution which is able to recognize human emotions (and mood) and show it on timeline charts.
The solution built with usage Google Cloud Natural Language API, ML algorithms (for pre-processing and post-processing data), JS library for visualization and a lot of magic under the hood).

projects.title: Refinement and refactoring of the current Architecture (Traum-Ferienwohnungen)
projects.description:
The project is about refinement and refactoring of the Traum-Ferienwohnungen Architecture.

I tick most of the boxes on SOA, Microservices architecture, JavaScript frameworks, MVC patterns, principles of REST APIs for all subsystems, Kafka, Maven and Jenkins;

I lead design efforts and thinking and communicate in formats and detail appropriate to each stake-holder groups and communicate solution architecture to technical and business stakeholders.

I also own and maintain the architecture design for end to end platform which also covering Integration and API assets, back end / core service providers, data storage and processing layers.

projects.title: Quality Assurance by Artificial Intelligence™
projects.description:
QAbyAI.com™ is the AI-powered platform with a comprehensive approach which makes Test Automation on all level of application really automated. By Artificial Intelligence.

Quality Assurance by Artificial Intelligence™ was founded for bringing the full power of Machine Learning and comprehensive testing approach to made software even better.

In QAbyAI™ we build the platform which eliminates barriers to implementing automation with a codeless approach. We believe in the idea that everyone for the entire Product and Tech Team should be able to test application on all levels and be able to create Automation Tests and ensure the Product Quality even without coding skills.

QAbyAI™ is the platform which automates, check and ensure the Quality of the Product on all levels of application.

projects.title: SaaS project (Harver)
projects.description:
Harver revolutionizes pre-hire talent assessment and substitutes the traditional HR cycle with a new industry standard of preselection. Our predictive analytics determine with extreme accuracy exactly which candidates will perform best in the job. It’s automated, data- driven and intelligent - learning from client feedback and adjusting its algorithms accordingly. Our solution taps directly into the applicant’s core competencies, translating into real-life, predictive fresh data. Embedded as integral SaaS solution within the clients HR process.

For more info visit www.harver.com.

On a high level: make better, faster decisions, optimize costs (especially on AWS side), create new experiences, design future-proof applications,  and optimize CarNext Business with the power of data and machine learning (ML).
profile_positions.title: Senior Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description:
I have joined OYO to help transform the European hospitality landscape.

First and foremost, I focused on people leadership: leading, managing, inspiring, motivating, and growing people. I always put people first. My second focus was on Technology, Craft & Delivery, shaping working, coaching, and mentoring, and driving a culture of ownership and excellence. Lastly, I was responsible for Architecture & Product Strategy, shaping and delivering vision, mission, and roadmap. 

Product:
HMS - internal hotel management system of OYO. One of the leading products of the company.

Responsibility:
I lead engineering efforts (with the main focus on Team Leadership) to add a cloud-native feature to the existing OYO HMS Platform. Support for native services on AWS, Azure, and GCP, to facilitate native storage, messaging, routing, orchestrated container-based deployment, and other contemporary features.

Technology Product Development: 
Building a strategic tech plan for future products and technical architecture was also part of my responsibilities during my OYO work.

Technology:
Java 8, Spring Boot, REST, JDBC, Hibernate, Elasticsearch, JBoss, Oracle, MySQL, OpenAPI, AWS, EC2, RDS, Kubernetes, PCF, Microservices, JavaScript, RAML, Jenkins, Docker, Kafka, JMS, Event-driven

I was responsible for Tech & Product Europe Teams based in Amsterdam. 
Digital Transformation and the strategy of the company were part of my responsibilities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Engineering Manager

profile_positions.description:
* most project details are still under NDA.

Worked as a Sr. Solution Architect and Cloud Architect. In addition to my Architecture duties, I've also served Traum-Ferienwohnungen as Engineering Manager.

During my service in Traum-Ferienwohnungen I have helped the team tackle the most critical and complex issues (incl. but not limited to Cybersecurity space, Integrations, IT Service Management, Enterprise Architecture, and Solution Architecture) in current architecture across the whole development team.

At a glance:
In Traum-Ferienwohnungen, I Lead an Engineering Team and introduce a new state-of-art serverless API-first, Cloud-based, and Microservices based architecture.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Solution Architect | Cloud Architect

profile_positions.description: I have joined HPC Technical Computing Advisory Panel to bring all my domain knowledge and expertise in Parallel Computing, High-Performance Computing, Data Engineering, Machine Learning, and Data Science to help the company shape the future direction of Parallel High-Performance Computing with the usage of Machine Learning and Big Data.
profile_positions.title: Member Of The Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description:
I have been promoted to a Data Engineer role to bring all my Domain and Technology in Data Engineering, Machine Learning, and Data Science expertise to build an AI-based Matching Engine for True Data-Driven Hiring.

Also, leverage AI's power through our proprietary self-learning matching algorithm that gets better over time. With every candidate that passes through Harver, the platform optimizes the factors predictive for quality for hire.

Briefly tech stack:

• Programming languages: Python

• Application & Data: node.js, Angular, Bootstrap, jQuery, D3.js, PostgresSQL, MongoDB

• Data Science | Machine Learning: python and a lot of magic under the hood)

• Data retrieval and processing: Apache Spark (AWS Glue, EMR), Elastic Search

• Databases: MongoDB, S3

• Architecture: Data lake, Machine Learning, event-driven development, REST APIs

• General: npm, typescript, JS, git, github, Postman & Newman, BrowserStack, Data warehouse, Google Analytics, gulp, TSLint, Swagger, Firehose, Kubernetes, Mathematics, Studio 3T, RESTful API, AI Strategy,  Cryptography, Artificial Intelligence, Statistical Data Analysis, SQL and no-SQL databases, Data Management, Software Design, Data Strategy, ETL Tools, Data Architecture, Pipelines, Data analysis, etc.
profile_positions.title: Data Engineer | Cloud Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As an Engineering Manager and QA Lead, I joined Harver to:
• Build world-class Test Automation and QA Team to define the processes and put in place the right tools to ensure a product of impeccable quality and help with CI implementation in Jenkins.
• Build a strong Data Team and bring all my Domain and Technology experience in Data Engineering, Machine Learning, and Data Science expertise to build an AI-based Matching Engine for True Data-Driven Hiring.
• Bring Security Leadership, help with Information Security challenges for the saas platform, and make the Security by Design approach a foundation principle for Development Team.

Some of the responsibilities:
• Refine and research technical requirements and provide technical expertise and knowledge to make Harver SaaS solution more future-proof and scalable.
• Identify and communicate project issues to all key stakeholders promptly.
• Provide required advice on Solution Architecture subjects to the whole Team
• Drive development and functionality of a matrix-oriented virtual team focused on the design & deployment of solutions at a global scale
• Establish a trusted and strategic advisor relationship with each assigned client and drive the continued value of Harver's solution.
• Define and drive improvements in product development, delivery methodologies, and technical best practices for Product and Development Teams.
• Coordinate technical input and review to ensure that the customer requirements are understood, and professional service efforts are communicated appropriately.
• Own and respond to bids, including running the Proof of Concept (POC) from inception to close.
• Refine and research technical requirements.
• Coordinate communication streams across multiple groups and platforms to ensure transparency and efficiency.


Digital Transformation and the Strategy of the company were part of my responsibilities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Engineering Manager | QA Lead

profile_positions.description:
As Senior Technical Manager and Full Stack Automation Consultant, I joined FedEx Corporation and TNT Digital department to bring my deep technical and management experience and skills in Advanced Analytics, Blockchain, IoT, AI, and Test Automation to help the company become a global leader in the logistics market worldwide.

By implementing these strategies and solutions, these two companies have seen substantial revenue increases and market share and, with Automation, dramatically improved the quality of the deliverable on all levels.

As Technical Manager and Automation Consultant, I joined FedEx and TNT to:
• Build a strong Automation Team and bring all my expertise in Advanced Analytics, Test Automation, and best CI practices to deliver better software quality and make the development process more CI-oriented.
• As a Technical Leader and Enterprise Architect, help with IoT and Blockchain implementation to make the organization more competitive in a global market.
• As a Strategic Consultant, I helped the company to drive innovations and ensure that technical implementation is correct (for different projects), and consistent and accurate KPIs are in place.
• Set agile principles and the Scrum development process as the foundation of the deliverable process.
• Implementation, realization, and evaluation of the project according to the statement of work and project plan.

Briefly tech stack:
• Application & Data: JavaScript, Node.js, AngularJS,
jQuery, D3.js, PostgreSQL, Hadoop, Java, DynamoDB,
Amazon VPS, Amazon SQS

• Test automation & unit tests: Cucumber, Protractor [JavaScript], jasmine,
karma, Chai.js, BDD/TDD, Mocha, Selenium [Java], Appium moment [and hu
dreds other packages], Apache Maven.

• CI/CD: Jenkins, Bamboo CI Server, CircleCI.

• Machine Learning/Business Intelligence: Python, scikit-learn, Keras,
pandas, R, TensorFlow, python, Theano, NumPy, IPython.
profile_positions.title: Senior Technical Manager | Full Stack Automation Consultant | Cloud Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As Senior Engineering Manager in Automation Team, I joined Dimebox (Software as a Service (SaaS) Company) to help build an innovative Fraud Prevention solution (3-D Secure) and a single global payment unified platform to provide the customers a seamless payment experience with any payment method (Dimebox got acquired by VeriFone). 

As a Technical Leader and Senior QA Lead, I also help Dimebox to build world-class Test Automation and QA Team, to define the processes and to put in place the right tools, ensure a product of impeccable quality, and help with Continuous Integration implementation in Jenkins.

Digital Transformation and Company Strategy were part of my responsibilities.

Briefly tech stack:

• Test Automation: Mocha.js + Chai.js, Zombie.js, Serenity BDD, Selenium WebDriver, JUnit, Maven,  WebdriverIO + PhantomJS (mocking)
• Security & Penetration testing: OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite, Acunetix, W3af, Fiddler, sqlmap, wikto, Wireshark, Metasploit, Nessus, THC Hydra
• Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous delivery: Jenkins, Strider
• Programming language: JavaScript (mostly), Java, Python (ML), Haskell (ML)
• Frameworks: Node.js, Angular, React, Vue.js (JavaScript)
• Databases (NoSQL and SQL): MongoDB (Mongoose), SQL, MariaDB
• System Infrastructure: Docker, *NIX, Bash scripting, Vagrant, Redis
• Machine learning: scikit-learn, NumPy, Python, Haskell (functional programming) and a lot of magic behind)
• Software development methodologies: Agile, Scrum
• General: GitHub, json-schema, gulp.js, TypeScript, Blockchain, Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, Apache Hadoop, HDFS, Bower, git, npm, Big data, enterprise architecture, Data analysis, RESTful API, Postgres, General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) compliance, Performance Management,  Artificial Intelligence, Cryptography, Apache Hadoop, Postman, business architecture, SoapUI, PCI DSS, Test management, Integration testing, Unit Testing, Linux, Test Automation Architecture, Automated Frontend Testing, API testing.
profile_positions.title: Senior Engineering Manager | Tech Lead (Automation Team)

profile_positions.description:
As a Technical Manager, I have led the Engagement technology department, and as Test Automation Engineer, I also help About you build a world-class Test Automation and QA Team, define the processes and put in place the right tools, ensure a product of impeccable quality, and help with Continuous Integration implementation in Jenkins.

Some of my responsibilities as a Technical Manager:
• Operational (daily) team management, including staffing, recruitment, and annual performance cycles
• Responsible for both running an operational demonstration plant and also preparing a full-scale commercial production unit
• Ensures sufficient and accurate data is available for the evaluation of product reliability, FCO reliability, and critical market performance
• Optimize and execute a strategy for Technical Operations that align with the overall strategy
Constantly monitor and report on progress to all the stakeholders
• Ensure quality deliverables and client satisfaction
• Identify risks and issues and resolve the same
• Plan programs, including projects, timelines, teams, deliverables, and budget

Automation and data-wise hands-on experience:
• Working within one of the leading e-commerce project in Germany, Austria, and the Swiss market, payments systems, integrations testing, and more
• Work with Selenium (Java) and Maven
• Work with Backend automation and Unit testing (PHPUnit) and Codeception
• Experience with Continuous Integration & Build Server (Jenkins, Bamboo CI, Sauce Labs)
• Work with MySQL, Maria DB, Oracle Database, and NoSQL (mostly Apache Cassandra and Mongo DB)
• Experience with mobile application automation (Protractor and Cucumber)
• Experience with cloud solutions (AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure)
• Experience working with Laravel framework (PHP)
• Experience with UNIX/Linux operating systems and experience with Shell scripting
• Experience developing Recommendation Systems based on Machine Learning Algorithms (mostly on Python)
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Automation Engineer | Tech Leader
